title: "The Religion that is not a Religion" w/ Andrew Sweeny - Voices with Vervaeke
description:
Andrew Sweeny and I discuss the idea of the religion that it is not a religion. It is a religion in that it is not an ideology and takes transcendence and sacredness seriously, but it is not a religion in the sense that it rejects the axial age two world grammar.

This is part of my series Voices with Vervaeke: Science, Spirituality, and the Meaning Crisis.

Here is the link to Andrew's channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/andrewsweenymusic
